DOC.brief_summary: To identify biomechanical sensibility change people posterior capsule tightness people without shoulder pain .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Subjects With Posterior Capsule Tightness
DOC.detailed_description: Some study show posterior capsule tightness relate shoulder dysfunction kinematics alteration . This study divide two study . The purpose study 1 ass scapular humeral kinematics , strength shoulder external rotators pressure pain threshold subject posterior capsule tightness without shoulder pain . Study 2 verify effect two different treatment subject posterior capsule tightness shoulder pain variable study 1 . One-hundred subject participate first study divide 4 group : Group 1 - 25 subject shoulder pain posterior capsule tightness ; Group 2 - 25 subject shoulder pain posterior capsule tightness ; Group 3 - 25 subject shoulder pain posterior capsule tightness ; group 4 - 25 subject shoulder pain posterior capsule tightness . All subject complete DASH Shoulder Pain Disability Index questionnaire . External internal rotation range motion , strength external rotators , scapular kinematics humeral translation arm elevation , pressure pain threshold measure . For second study 50 subject shoulder pain posterior capsule tightness recruit . The subject randomly divide 2 group : experimental group control group . The experimental group receive glenohumeral posterior mobilization , stretch posterior capsule strengthen shoulder external rotators . The control group ultrasound ; , stretch upper trapezius scapular squeezing . Both group receive intervention 3x/week/4 week . All subject supervise one physiotherapist variable study 1 analyzed pre post-intervention .
DOC.criteria: subject posterior capsule tightness shoulder pain . So : low flexion test ( flexion + internal rotation ) > 7° , arm ; symptom consistent shoulder impingement arm elevation close 150° determine digital inclinometer . The diagnosis SIS make base clinical examination selfreported history . To classified shoulder impingement , subject present least 3 follow : positive Neer test , positive Hawkins test , positive Jobe test , pain passive isometric resist shoulder lateral rotation , pain active shoulder elevation , pain anterolateral shoulder region . Individuals group exclude : pregnant ; ligamentous laxity base positive Sulcus test , Apprehension test anterior drawer ; history clavicle , scapula humerus fracture ; history shoulder surgery traumatic lesion ; adhesive capsulitis scoliosis ; systemic illness ; transpore tape allergy ; body mass index > 28kg/m2 ; physical therapy treatment last 6 month ; bilateral symptom ; steroid injection last 6 week ; drug muscle relaxant last 72 hour .
